verses.verse: Finally <WG3063>, my <WG3450> brothers <WG80>, rejoice <WG5463> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962>. To write <WG1125> the same things <WG846> to you <WG5213>, to me <WG1698> indeed <WG3303> is not <WG3756> severe <WG3636>, but <WG1161> for you <WG5213> it is safe <WG804>.
Beware <WG991> of dogs <WG2965>, beware <WG991> of <WG2040> evil <WG2556> workers <WG2040>, beware <WG991> of the false circumcision <WG2699>.

For <WG1063> we <WG2249> are <WG2070> the circumcision <WG4061>, which worship <WG3000> God <WG2316> in the spirit <WG4151>, and <WG2532> rejoice <WG2744> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>, and <WG2532> have <WG3982> no <WG3756> confidence <WG3982> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561>.

Though <WG2539> I <WG1473> might <WG2192> also <WG2532> have <WG2192> confidence <WG4006> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561>. If <WG1487> any <WG5100> other <WG243> man <WG5100> thinks <WG1380> that he has reasons he might trust <WG3982> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561>, I <WG1473> more <WG3123>:

Circumcised <WG4061> the eighth <WG3637> day <WG1537>, of the stock <WG1085> of Israel <WG2474>, of the tribe <WG5443> of Benjamin <WG958>, a Hebrew <WG1445> of <WG1537> the Hebrews <WG1445>; as touching <WG2596> the law <WG3551>, a Pharisee <WG5330>;
Concerning <WG2596> zeal <WG2205>, persecuting <WG1377> the church <WG1577>; touching <WG2596> the righteousness <WG1343> which <WG3588> is <WG1096> in <WG1722> the law <WG3551>, blameless <WG273>.
But <WG235> what things <WG3748> were <WG2258> gain <WG2771> to me <WG3427>, those <WG5023> I counted <WG2233> loss <WG2209> for <WG1223> Christ <WG5547>.

Yes <WG235> doubtless <WG3304>, and <WG2532> I count <WG2233> all things <WG3956> but <WG1511> loss <WG2209> for <WG1223> the excellency <WG5242> of the knowledge <WG1108> of Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> my <WG3450> Lord <WG2962>: for <WG1223> whom <WG3739> I have suffered the loss of <WG2210> all things <WG3956>, and <WG2532> do count <WG2233> <WG99999> them but dung <WG4657>, that <WG2443> I may win <WG2770> Christ <WG5547>,

And <WG2532> be found <WG2147> in <WG1722> him <WG846>, not <WG3361> having <WG2192> my own <WG1699> righteousness <WG1343>, which is <WG3588> of <WG1537> the law <WG3551>, but <WG235> that which is <WG3588> through <WG1223> the faith <WG4102> of Christ <WG5547>, the righteousness <WG1343> which is <WG3588> of <WG1537> God <WG2316> by <WG1909> faith <WG4102>:

That <WG3588> I may know <WG1097> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> the power <WG1411> of <WG386> his <WG846> resurrection <WG386>, and <WG2532> the fellowship <WG2842> of <WG3804> his <WG846> sufferings <WG3804>, being made conformable unto <WG4833> his <WG846> death <WG2288>;
If <WG1487> by any means <WG4459> I might attain <WG2658> unto <WG1519> the resurrection <WG1815> of the dead <WG3498>.

Not <WG3756> as though <WG3754> I had <WG2983> already <WG2235> attained <WG2983>, either <WG2228> were <WG5048> already <WG2235> perfect <WG5048>: but <WG1161> I follow after <WG1377>, if <WG1487> that <WG2532> I may apprehend <WG2638> that for <WG1909> which <WG3739> also <WG2532> I am apprehended <WG2638> of <WG5259> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>.

Brothers <WG80>, I <WG1473> count <WG3049> not <WG3756> myself <WG1683> to have apprehended <WG2638>: but <WG1161> this one thing <WG1520> I do <WG1950>, forgetting those things <WG3303> which are <WG3588> behind <WG3694>, and <WG1161> reaching forth <WG1901> unto those things which are <WG3588> before <WG1715>,
I press <WG1377> toward <WG2596> the mark <WG4649> for <WG1909> the prize <WG1017> of the <WG2821> high <WG507> calling <WG2821> of God <WG2316> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>.

Let us <WG5426> therefore <WG3767>, as many as <WG3745> be perfect <WG5046>, be thus <WG5124> minded <WG5426>: and <WG2532> if <WG1487> in any thing <WG5100> you be <WG5426> otherwise <WG2088> minded <WG5426>, God <WG2316> shall reveal <WG601> even <WG2532> this <WG5124> unto you <WG5213>.
Nevertheless <WG4133>, where <WG3739> to <WG1519> we have already attained <WG5348>, let us walk <WG4748> by the <WG2583> same <WG846> rule <WG2583>, let us mind <WG5426> the same thing <WG846>.

Brothers <WG80>, be <WG1096> followers together <WG4831> of me <WG3450>, and <WG2532> mark <WG4648> them which walk <WG4043> so as <WG3779> you have <WG2192> us <WG2248> for <WG2531> an example <WG5179>.

(For <WG1063> many <WG4183> walk <WG4043>, of whom <WG3739> I have told <WG3004> you <WG5213> often <WG4178>, and <WG1161> now <WG3568> tell you <WG3004> even <WG2532> weeping <WG2799>, that they are the enemies <WG2190> of the cross <WG4716> of Christ <WG5547>:

Whose <WG3739> end <WG5056> is destruction <WG684>, whose <WG3739> God <WG2316> is their belly <WG2836>, and <WG2532> whose glory <WG1391> is in <WG1722> their <WG846> shame <WG152>, who <WG3588> mind <WG5426> earthly things <WG1919>.)

For <WG1063> our <WG2257> conversation <WG4175> is <WG5225> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>; from <WG1537> where <WG3739> also <WG2532> we look <WG553> for the Savior <WG4990>, the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>:

Who <WG3739> shall change <WG3345> our <WG2257> vile <WG5014> body <WG4983>, that <WG1519> it <WG846> may be <WG1096> fashioned like unto <WG4832> his <WG846> glorious <WG1391> body <WG4983>, according to <WG2596> the working <WG1753> by which <WG3588> he <WG846> is able <WG1410> even <WG2532> to subdue <WG5293> all things <WG3956> unto himself <WG1438>.
